./.title: Preface
./.body:
Preface
Raspberry Pi Full Stack is an open source book entirely written by NanJing Longer Vision Robot Technology Ltd.. In this book, over 20 examples are to be discussed for the Raspberry Pi applications. You will get familiar with:

Basic concepts on what Raspberry Pi is
How to install the operating system Raspbian onto an Raspberry Pi
How to use GPIO on Raspberry Pi by around 20 examples
Pi CAM
And our target of this book is to finally build a Raspberry Pi based race car, namely, an Mini-size Autonomous Vehicle with selected sensors.

The book is put on gitbook at: https://longervision.gitbooks.io/raspberry-pi-full-stack/, and all source code is tested and put on github at: https://github.com/LongerVision/RaspberryPI .
All the existing online resource is licensed as it is. And all the content designed by NanJing Longer Vision Robot Technology Ltd. are reserved to NanJing Longer Vision Robot Technology Ltd.. The customers/students are allowed to learn from the content, to download the code and book, to modify the code, and even release the code without changing the license.

Part1_Introduction/.title: Part 1 - Introduction
Part1_Introduction/.body:
Part 1 - Introduction
Let's start the fascinating Raspberry Pi journey.

Part1_Introduction/01_Getting_Started_wi.title: Chapter 1. Getting Started with Raspberry Pi
Part1_Introduction/01_Getting_Started_wi.body:
Chapter 1 - Getting Started with Raspberry Pi
According to the definition on Wikipedia,

The Raspberry Pi is a series of small single-board computers developed in the United Kingdom by the Raspberry Pi Foundation to promote the teaching of basic computer science in schools and in developing countries..

...

The Raspberry Pi hardware has evolved through several versions that feature variations in memory capacity and peripheral-device support.

All Raspberry Pi versions have been using Broadcom SoC, including BCM2835, BCM2836 and now BCM2837.
For more info, please refer to https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Raspberry_Pi .

Part1_Introduction/01_Getting_Started_wi.title: 1.1 About Raspberry Pi 3B
Part1_Introduction/01_Getting_Started_wi.body:
1.1 About Raspberry Pi 3B
Arduino official website describes the Arduino board in detail: https://www.raspberrypi.org/documentation/installation/installing-images/linux.md.

Part1_Introduction/01_Getting_Started_wi.title: 1.2 Raspberry Pi Online Resource
Part1_Introduction/01_Getting_Started_wi.body:
1.3 Raspberry Pi Online Resource
1.3.1 Official Websites

https://www.raspberrypi.org/
https://www.raspbian.org/

1.3.2 Third Party Open Source Code

Github - Longer Vision
Github - Raspberry Pi
Github.io - Raspberry Pi

1.3.3 Atmel Chips' Data Sheet

Atmel

1.3.4 AVR C Compiler Resource

Savannah NonGNU AVR Libc
GNU AVR-GCC

1.3.5 Popular Tools

Savannah NonGNU AVRDUDE
Savannah NonGNU Simulavr
AVaRICE

1.3.6 Official Forums

https://www.raspberrypi.org/forums/

1.3.7 Popular Ecosystem Forums

Adafruit
Sparkfun
AVRfreaks
reddit
geek-workshop

1.3.8 Arduino Cheat Sheet
The original Arduino Cheat Sheet is obtained from http://robodino.org/resources/arduino.

1.3.9 Evolution Tree for Arduino
The original Evolution Tree for Arduino is obtained from
http://imgur.com/yGRLPvL.

Part1_Introduction/01_Getting_Started_wi.title: 1.3 Install Raspbian onto a RPI 3B
Part1_Introduction/01_Getting_Started_wi.body:
1.2 Install Raspbian onto Raspberry Pi
Students who take our courses about robotics on-site will be given a FREE set of Arduino Kit. Students are also welcome to puchase the kit from our website at https://www.raspberrypi.org/documentation/installation/installing-images/linux.md.

Part1_Introduction/01_Getting_Started_wi.title: 1.4 Locale Configuration
Part1_Introduction/01_Getting_Started_wi.body:
1.4 Locale Configuration

raspi-config
dpkg-reconfigure locales
dpkg-reconfigure tzdata
dpkg-reconfigure locales
dpkg-reconfigure keyboard-configuration

Part4/.title: Part 4 - Raspberry Pi Based Mini Automated Vehicle
Part4/.body:
Part 4 - Raspberry Pi Based Mini Automated Vehicle
In this Part, an Raspberry Pi based mini automated vehicle is to be built and able to run.
